system.description:
You have secured a powerful item and a source of eldritch power and begun to learn to use them together. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You may change your warlock spellcasting ability to match your wielder spellcasting ability if you desire. Once made, this choice is permanent.
  • When you would gain an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ccymzytvxost335r]{Invocation} or a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.krwn0da3yjm9lh57]{Relic Art}, add half of your other class levels (warlock for relic arts and wielder for invocations) for the purpose of determining if you meet level-based prerequisites.
  • You can use artifact charges and warlock spell points interchangeably for spellcasting.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in warlock, 3 levels in wielder
